name: SFTPFileUploadTask
description: Uploads files to an SFTP server.
author: Thomas Barnekow

inputs.name: localFolder
inputs.label: Local Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Local folder containing the file identified by the File Pattern.

inputs.name: filePattern
inputs.label: File Pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: File name or pattern identifying the file (e.g., '\*.exe', '\*.msi').

inputs.name: remoteFolder
inputs.label: Remote Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Remote folder to which the file should be uploaded (e.g., 'path/to/folder').

inputs.name: sftpHost
inputs.label: SFTP Host
inputs.helpMarkDown: Fully qualified domain name of SFTP host (e.g., 'host.domain.com').
